# ovscout

## Installation

You can install from [GitHub](https://github.com/openvolley/ovscout) with:

```{r eval = FALSE}
## install.packages("remotes") ## if needed
remotes::install_github("openvolley/ovscout")

```

## About

This R package provides shiny apps for editing, video syncing,  and (eventually) scouting volleyball data files.

At this stage it is entirely experimental. Beware!
